text: Implement real-time synchronization of warehouse inventory data every 5 seconds across all locations, with a mandatory fallback queuing mechanism if API latency exceeds 1 second, ensuring bulk catch-up synchronization within 30 seconds; discrepancies of more than 10 units must be logged to the inv_sync_errors table and immediately trigger a PagerDuty alert; this requirement is not negotiable and must be fully rolled out and operational by the end of the current sprint.

structured_data.summary: Sync inventory every 5 seconds across all locations
structured_data.additionalNotes: Real-time synchronization requirement for warehouse inventory across locations.

structured_data.summary: Implement fallback queue if API latency exceeds 1 second
structured_data.additionalNotes: Fallback system triggers to ensure no data loss during high latency.

structured_data.summary: Ensure bulk catch-up synchronization within 30 seconds
structured_data.additionalNotes: Bulk synchronization clears queued data during fallback conditions.

structured_data.summary: Log inventory discrepancies greater than 10 units
structured_data.additionalNotes: Discrepancies above 10 units must be logged to inv_sync_errors.

structured_data.summary: Trigger PagerDuty alert on >10 unit inventory mismatch
structured_data.additionalNotes: Automated alerting for inventory mismatch incidents.
